import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add Mod Rating"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/ratings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Submit a positive or negative rating for a mod. Each user can supply only one rating for a mod, subsequent ratings will override the old value. Successful request will return [Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/message-object).

    :::note
    You can order mods by their rating, and view their rating in the [Mod Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/mod-object).
    :::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Add Rating Request","properties":{"rating":{"type":"integer","example":"1","deprecated":true}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Add Rating Response","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":201},"message":{"type":"string","example":"You have successfully submitted a rating for the specified mod."}},"type":"object"}}}},"400":{"description":"The authenticated user has already submitted a rating for this mod.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15028":"The authenticated user has already submitted a rating for this mod.","15043":"The authenticated user is trying to revert a rating that doesn't exist."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
